channel.title: Comments on: Dinosaurs are Totally Rad
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I don't think it had a name. It may have been something Chad came up with as an excuse to write a bunch of double entendres.
item.content:encoded: I don’t think it had a name. It may have been something Chad came up with as an excuse to write a bunch of double entendres.

item.title: By: Mischa
item.dc:creator: Mischa
item.description: Okay, awesome tale, but what was the game called?
item.content:encoded: Okay, awesome tale, but what was the game called?

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: #1 was a shopping spree. Like the kind where you win a shopping spree at Toys 'R Us. While at first that seemed attractive, I realized I didn't really want a ton of more stuff in my life. So I decided that it would be a shopping spree to get a bunch of stuff I could give to my friends who needed things or maybe I could sell on eBay.
item.content:encoded: #1 was a shopping spree. Like the kind where you win a shopping spree at Toys ‘R Us. While at first that seemed attractive, I realized I didn’t really want a ton of more stuff in my life. So I decided that it would be a shopping spree to get a bunch of stuff I could give to my friends who needed things or maybe I could sell on eBay.

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
Ok, nice graphic, but what WAS your #1? (inquiring minds want to know...)
It sounds like a really good time...
item.content:encoded:
Ok, nice graphic, but what WAS your #1? (inquiring minds want to know…)

It sounds like a really good time…
